title: 72000 Nadis and 114 Chakras in Human Body for Healing and Meditation
description: The book discusses 114 chakras and 72,000 nadis in depth. The names, locations, and functions of the nadis and chakras are explained. The book has five parts. The 1st part of the book discusses the spiritual significance of 72,000 nadis and 114 chakras for self-awakening. The 2nd part of the book discusses the scientific significance of the nadis in the light of modern neuroscience. The 3rd part of the book explained the awakening of the self-healing, self-curing, and immune activation mechanisms through nadi awakening. The 4th part of the book discusses nadi and chakra clearing, cleaning, balancing practices, and emotional regulation practices through nadi activation. It discusses the relationship between 72000 nadis and the 72 primary emotions of human being. The last part of the body explains the nadi system history and the ancient literature.
author: Amit Ray
